column1: Hello,I'm planning a family road trip mid July from Chicago to Colorado but concerned about any road state closure in regards to covid. Would appreciate any input from anyone whose been on a road trip recently of what do I have to know. Thanks so much
Welcome to the Forums!There aren't any road closures due to covid-19 except on Indian reservations. Stay on the interstates.
If you plan to visit RMNP, you need an advance reservation for a timed entry there.
